English: Shantou (formerly romanized as Swatow), prefecture-level city in Guangdong

d.f: `位於~`廣東省~`東北~`部~，`南~`臨~`南海~，`北~`濱~`韓~`江口~`的~`城市~。`為~`閩~`西~、`粵~`東~`出海~`的~`要道~，`華僑~`來往~`的~`大口~`岸~，`位於~`潮~`汕~`鐵路~`的~`終點~，`交通~`便利~，`商務~`繁盛~。

English: Shantou (formerly romanized as Swatow), prefecture-level city in Guangdong
